alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:07PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. Lucie, Okeechobee, Indian River, southern Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 205 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several clusters of strong thunderstorms from Lake Okeechobee to near Deer Park and Blue Cypress Lake, moving northeast at 20 mph. These thunderstorms will interact with the east coast sea breeze, leading to stronger cells near the coast. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Sebastian, Satellite Beach and Treasure Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
